attributes.action: Ban speciation on oil prices on the uk oil markets.And ask other world goverments to do the same example the us goverment (as a major world oil buying country )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: speciation on oil price help drive oil prices up (the only people who benifit are the oil companies and the spectactors) not the user of the end product the motorist car drivers hauliers (and this help driver price up in other areas as the haulier who average fuel cost is 30% of their entire cost and average mg is between 7 and 8 mpg but are unable to change their opperating methords are struggling because of it and force their price up or driving them out of business (hauliers can't change price by the week and often their custmers won't allow as large increase as they require) by contrubting to high oil price they are help drive haulier out of business and increasing unemployment and increasing inflation

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
